nodes.bodyText:
Given you get all the known subclasses here, I fail to see while you need the outer while loop?
This method also includes the non-direct subclasses.
concrete class of subclass of subclass
Could we rename the variable? It's not an interface but an abstract class.
No offense, but its often hard enough to get a PR approved with these kinds of style reviews.  In other words, these kinds of comments piss me off :)
